level.heading: Retention of records.
level.text: * ยง 3-220 Retention of records.--Every person to whom this subchapter is applicable shall keep for at least five years a detailed and exact account of: (1) all compensation of any amount or value whatsoever; (2) the name and address of every person paying or promising to pay compensation of fifty dollars or more and the date thereof; (3) all expenditures made by or on behalf of the client; and (4) the name and address of every person to whom any item of expenditure exceeding fifty dollars is made, the date thereof and receipted bill for said expenditure. * NB Effective until May 16, 2014 * ยง 3-220 Retention of records.
